pageContent: Purpose: In this review, we address adherence rates in clinical settings, barriers to compliance with dosing schedules, and potential strategies to overcome challenges in maintaining high levels of adherence.

metaData.source:
Retrograde versus antegrade nerve sparing during robot-assisted radical prostatectomy: which is better for achieving early functional recovery?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23092543/
